content.prompt: Washington most likely wrote about political parties for which of the following purposes?

choices.label: To warn the public that political parties result in national divisions
To explain how political parties are good for the economy
To assert that political parties only work in democratic republics
To argue that political parties encourage foreign interference

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
